items.title: Morgan Stanley says this solar stock is a 'key beneficiary of tariffs over the long term'
items.description: First Solar will have some near-term exposure to Trump's taxes on imports, but the company could benefit over the long term.

items.title: How 20% declines in stocks came to be known as 'bear markets' on Wall Street
items.description: The definition of exactly what constitutes a bear market can depend on who you ask.
